mapper.sql: create_by , create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, id, user_id, project_id, version, create_id, update_id, delete_flag
mapper.select: SELECT tab FROM t_user_mtm_project a JOIN t_project ON a.project_id = t_project.id WHERE t_project.create_id = #{user_id} AND a.delete_flag = 0 AND t_project.delete_flag = 0

SELECT a.id, a.user_id, a.project_id, b.group_id, (SELECT name FROM t_group WHERE id = b.group_id AND delete_flag = 0 LIMIT 1) AS group_name, b.name AS project_name, b.tab AS project_tab, b.description AS project_desc, b.create_id, (SELECT real_name FROM t_user WHERE id = b.create_id AND delete_flag = 0 LIMIT 1) AS create_by, b.create_time, b.update_id, (SELECT real_name FROM t_user WHERE id = b.update_id AND delete_flag = 0 LIMIT 1) AS update_by, b.update_time FROM t_user_mtm_project a JOIN t_project b ON a.project_id = b.id WHERE a.delete_flag = 0 AND b.delete_flag = 0 AND a.user_id = #{user_id} AND a.project_id = #{project_id} LIMIT 1
